pricing.subheading: Get the power of customization you need to manage your transactions, payments and business

pricing-details.title: Small Medium Business
pricing-details.second: ₹5- 65 per mandate for annual subscription plan

pricing.content: We understand scale. Get in touch for a custom pricing plan designed for your business requirement.

heading.subheading: France Pay provides cross-border payment solutions in one single platform and services that meets industries trends for international online B2C and B2B business models

favorite-cards.title: Less transaction charges
favorite-cards.preview: We guarantee you that we have less transaction charges that the other well known payment solutions such as paypal, google pay, visa payments or Lydia.

favorite-cards.title: Zero installation cost
favorite-cards.preview: There is no hassle in installation because there are none, you can immediately start using our service without any extra cost.

favorite-cards.title: Fast and secure
favorite-cards.preview: Thanks to our new technology based on QR Codes, your payment  is 100% safe and secure, it comes without saying that the payment is done instantly.

favorite-cards.title: Easy settlements to your bank account
favorite-cards.preview: There are very few settlements to understand  before using our solution, and we offer a large payment service that will surely satisfy your needs.

favorite-cards.title: Quick refunds
favorite-cards.preview: You made a payment by mistake? or you simply want a refund? No worries, we guarantee you quick refunds without asking you for any justification.

favorite-cards.title: No waiting time
favorite-cards.preview: Multiple payments at same time, no queue for clients.

business-dashboard.heading: Business dashboard and analytics
business-dashboard.content: Our solution comes along with a dashboard and analytics to help you view and regulate your sales and have a better forecast of your future costs and needs.

content.title: Boost your cash
content.content: Your cash receipts are transferred directly to your bank account on D + 1 working day.

content.title: Follow your activity in real time
content.content: Find your collection history in the application, by date, by context and by means of payment. Benefit from a global interface integrating complete reporting tools

heading.subheading: No service charges, no commitment, no fixed cost.

comparisons.title: Merchants - Direct sales
comparisons.tick-1: ✔ Unlimited and free access to the reporting functions of the Lyf Back Office.
comparisons.tick-2: ✔ Unlimited and free access to the functions Commercial animation of the Lyf Back Office.

comparisons.title: Liberal professions
comparisons.tick-1: ✔ Unlimited and free access to the reporting functions of the Lyf Back Office.

offers.mention: All the prices mentioned are exclusive of VAT. VAT applicable at 20%.
